overview: This portrait of a remarkable woman and her unusual environment seems to have a very profound effect on nearly everyone who sees it. The film further  strengthens the reputation of veteran documentarian Schreiner, who's quietly and steadily established himself among Europe's most respected practitioners  of non-fiction cinema. But the film is by no means an example of an ‘auteur’  imposing his individual vision upon the world. Instead it's a remarkable example of intense collaboration between artist and subject, one so close  that such traditional distinctions and labels seem inappropriate.
title: Bellavista
